TITLE.P: EØS 021-2018 [EEA 021-2018] Wash and hire of uniforms for District Nurses.

SHORT_DESCR.P: In 2018, Bergen kommune, the Agency for home based services, shall implement a competition for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

District Nursing is divided into ten geographic zones and there will be somewhere between 20 and 30 delivery and collection addresses for workwear/uniforms. There are 250 employees who need uniforms each day of the year.
Bergen kommune wants to make contact with the supplier market for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

Potential tenderers are encouraged to give written feedback as soon as possible. We aim to hold dialogue meetings with one to one meetings to discover the best manner in which to implement the competition.

TEXT.P: In 2018, Bergen kommune, the Agency for home based services, shall implement a competition for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

District Nursing is divided into ten geographic zones and there will be somewhere between 20 and 30 delivery and collection addresses for workwear/uniforms. There are 250 employees who need uniforms each day of the year.
Bergen kommune wants to make contact with the supplier market for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

Potential tenderers are encouraged to give written feedback as soon as possible. We aim to hold dialogue meetings with one to one meetings to discover the best manner in which to implement the competition.
The deadline for feedback is 15.5.2018.
In 2018, Bergen kommune, the Agency for home based services, shall implement a competition for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

District Nursing is divided into ten geographic zones and there will be somewhere between 20 and 30 delivery and collection addresses for workwear/uniforms. There are 250 employees who need uniforms each day of the year.
Bergen kommune wants to make contact with the supplier market for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

Potential tenderers are encouraged to give written feedback as soon as possible. We aim to hold dialogue meetings with one to one meetings to discover the best manner in which to implement the competition.
The deadline for feedback is 15.4.2018.
In 2018, Bergen kommune, the Agency for home based services, shall implement a competition for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

District Nursing is divided into ten geographic zones and there will be somewhere between 20 and 30 delivery and collection addresses for workwear/uniforms. There are 250 employees who need uniforms each day of the year.
Bergen kommune wants to make contact with the supplier market for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

Potential tenderers are encouraged to give written feedback as soon as possible. We aim to hold dialogue meetings with one to one meetings to discover the best manner in which to implement the competition.
We are considering whether to set up so that all or parts of the competition are reserved contract, cf. PPR § 16-9.
§ 16-9. Contracts that are reserved for companies with disabled or disadvantaged personnel.

The Contracting Authority can limit the competition to organisations or programmes that have a primary objective of integrating disabled or disadvantaged persons into working life. This only applies when at least 30 percent of the employees in the organisation or the programme have a disability or are disadvantaged. If the contracting authority uses this option, he shall state this in the notice.
It if it not necessary to use reserved contracts, an including contract will be set up where, for example, there can be requirements set for a specific number of disabled or disadvantaged persons.
We particularly want feedback on this. The deadline for feedback is 15.5.2018.
In 2018, Bergen kommune, the Agency for home based services, shall implement a competition for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

District Nursing is divided into ten geographic zones and there will be somewhere between 20 and 30 delivery and collection addresses for workwear/uniforms. There are 250 employees who need uniforms each day of the year.
Bergen kommune wants to make contact with the supplier market for washing and hire of uniforms for district nurses.

Potential tenderers are encouraged to give written feedback as soon as possible. We aim to hold dialogue meetings with one to one meetings to discover the best manner in which to implement the competition.
We are considering whether to set up so that all or parts of the competition are reserved contract, cf. PPR § 16-9.
§ 16-9. Contracts that are reserved for companies with disabled or disadvantaged personnel

The Contracting Authority can limit the competition to organisations or programmes that have a primary objective of integrating disabled or disadvantaged persons into working life. This only applies when at least 30 percent of the employees in the organisation or the programme have a disability or are disadvantaged. If the contracting authority uses this option, he shall state this in the notice.
It if it not necessary to use reserved contracts, an including contract will be set up where, for example, there can be requirements set for a specific number of disabled or disadvantaged persons.
We particularly want feedback on this. The deadline for feedback is 15.4.2018.
